data statistic - the maximum data value

data statistic - the median data value
data statistic - the minimum data value
data statistic - the nn percentile (where nn is between 0 and 100)
data statistic - the RMS deviation from the mean sqrt( sum( (x-avg(x))^2 )/N )
data statistic - the skewness of the data
[m] Distance from instrument to Sun centre
Name of predefined settings used during obs.
Time scale of the time-related keywords
[m s-1] No velocity correction applied to WAVE coord.
a human-readable description of the waveband such as the (expected) strongest emission/absorption line or the most dominant/contributing line in filter images

Wavelength related kwds in vacuum (air or vac)
